content.rendered:
Eastern Airways is a British airline whose head office is at Humberside Airport in Kirmington, North Lincolnshire, England. It operates scheduled domestic and international services and private charter services. Around 800,000 passengers a year are carried on the scheduled route network.
Eastern Airways Address:
 Eastern Airways
Schiphol House
Humberside Airport
Kirmington
DN39 6YH

 Phone: Eastern Airways Customer Support

New bookings: 08703 669100
Other enquiries: 01652 680600
Charter Enquiries: 08703 669199

Email: customersupport@easternairways.com

 Working hours: Monday to Friday: 08.00 until 18.00;
Saturday and Sunday: Closed
Bank Holidays: Closed

 Aberdeen passenger lounge Opening Hours

Monday to Friday: 04.30 to 20.00
Saturday: Closed
Sunday: 13.30 to 20.00

Eastern Airways Official website: http://www.easternairways.com/

Eastern Airways Online Check-in: www.easternairways.com/online check-in

Note: Online Check in begins 24 hours before departure, and up until 90 minutes before your flight’s scheduled departure time.

Eastern Airways Check-in timing www.easternairways.com/check-in timing

Check Eastern Airways schedule here: www.easternairways.com/flight timetable

Check Eastern Airways flight status here: http://www.easternairways.com/flight status

Eastern Airways Baggage Allowance

Eastern Airways Baggage

View Eastern Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travel while pregnant in Eastern Airways

Expectant mothers can travel up to 23 weeks without providing a medical certificate. After 23 weeks and till 28 weeks, a medical certificate is required to confirm that the passenger is fit to travel.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Middle East Airlines

Total fleet: 33

  • BAe Jetstream 41
  • Embraer ERJ 145
  • Embraer 170
  • Saab 2000

Queries handled by Eastern Airways Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class,why fly any other way

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Eastern Airways Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Eastern Airways: (click on the stars below)
